item.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps from your Steam wishlist is now on sale!
item.itunes:title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps from your Steam wishlist is now on sale!
item.itunes:author: noreply@blogger.com (布丁布丁吃布丁)
item.itunes:summary:
1 GAME YOU'VE WISHED FOR IS ON SALE!
-67% NT$ 438  NT$ 144
MIDWEEK MADNESS! Offer ends 16 Aug 1:00am CST
Play the critically acclaimed masterpiece. Embark on a new journey in a vast, exotic world where you'll encounter towering enemies and challenging puzzles on your quest to unravel Ori's destiny.

item.title: Katamari Damacy REROLL and one other item from your Steam wishlist is now on sale!
item.itunes:title: Katamari Damacy REROLL and one other item from your Steam wishlist is now on sale!
item.itunes:author: noreply@blogger.com (布丁布丁吃布丁)
item.itunes:summary:
SAVE NOW ON 2 GAMES YOU'VE WISHED FOR!
-67% NT$ 590  NT$ 194
WEEK LONG DEAL! Offer ends 9 Aug 1:00am CST
The beloved roll-em-up game returns with fully updated graphics, completely recreated cutscenes and in full HD!
-30% NT$ 378  NT$ 264
WEEKEND DEAL! Offer ends 9 Aug 1:00am CST
Inscryption is an inky black card-based odyssey that blends the deckbuilding roguelike, escape-room style puzzles, and psychological horror into a blood-laced smoothie. Darker still are the secrets inscrybed upon the cards...

item.title: For The King from your Steam wishlist is now on sale!
item.itunes:title: For The King from your Steam wishlist is now on sale!
item.itunes:author: noreply@blogger.com (布丁布丁吃布丁)
item.itunes:summary:
1 GAME YOU'VE WISHED FOR IS ON SALE!
-70% NT$ 318  NT$ 95
SPECIAL PROMOTION! Offer ends 5 Aug 12:00am CST
For The King is a strategic RPG that blends tabletop and roguelike elements in a challenging adventure that spans the realms. Set off on a single player experience or play cooperatively both online and locally.

item.itunes:summary:
1 GAME YOU'VE WISHED FOR IS ON SALE!
-40% NT$ 398  NT$ 238
WEEK LONG DEAL! Offer ends 19 Jul 1:00am CST

item.title: God of War from your Steam wishlist is now on sale!
item.itunes:title: God of War from your Steam wishlist is now on sale!
item.itunes:author: noreply@blogger.com (布丁布丁吃布丁)
item.itunes:summary:
Explore the whole Summer Sale, now through 8 Jul 1:00am CST.
Hello pulipuli.chen!
THE STEAM SUMMER SALE HAS BEGUN
1 game from your wishlist − and thousands more − are on sale now through 8 Jul 1:00am CST.
1 GAME YOU'VE WISHED FOR IS ON SALE!
God of War
-20% NT$ 1,190  NT$ 952
SPECIAL PROMOTION! Offer ends 8 Jul 1:00am CST
His vengeance against the Gods of Olympus years behind him, Kratos now lives as a man in the realm of Norse Gods and monsters. It is in this harsh, unforgiving world that he must fight to survive… and teach his son to do the same.
Specific pricing and discounts may be subject to change. Please check the Steam store page for details.

item.itunes:author: noreply@blogger.com (布丁布丁吃布丁)
item.itunes:summary:
Explore the whole Summer Sale, now through 8 Jul 1:00am CST.
Hello pulipuli.chen!
THE STEAM SUMMER SALE HAS BEGUN
19 games from your wishlist − plus thousands more − are on sale now through 8 Jul 1:00am CST.
SAVE NOW ON 19 GAMES YOU'VE WISHED FOR!
FINAL FANTASY VII
-50% NT$ 350  NT$ 175
SPECIAL PROMOTION! Offer ends 8 Jul 1:00am CST
The RPG classic FINAL FANTASY VII returns to PC, now with brand new online features!
Ys Origin
-75% NT$ 468  NT$ 117
Brothers - A Tale of Two Sons
-90% NT$ 398  NT$ 39
The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky
-50% NT$ 468  NT$ 234
The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky SC
-35% NT$ 688  NT$ 447
MORE ITEMS FROM YOUR WISHLIST
FINAL FANTASY® XIII
-50% NT$ 460  NT$ 230
SPECIAL PROMOTION! Offer ends 8 Jul 1:00am CST
Final Fantasy XIII is a fantasy RPG in which a band of brave humans struggle against fate in the utopian sky city of Cocoon and the primeval world of Pulse. Follow stylish heroine Lightning's fast paced battles and high adventure in a mysterious new world.
FINAL FANTASY® XIII-2
-50% NT$ 540  NT$ 270
Valkyria Chronicles™
-70% NT$ 468  NT$ 140
CLANNAD
-65% NT$ 646  NT$ 226
FINAL FANTASY TYPE-0™ HD
-60% NT$ 840  NT$ 336
LIGHTNING RETURNS™: FINAL FANTASY® XIII
-50% NT$ 540  NT$ 270
SPECIAL PROMOTION! Offer ends 8 Jul 1:00am CST
Lightning Returns is the concluding chapter of the Final Fantasy XIII saga and series heroine Lightning's final battle. The grand finale of the trilogy brings a world reborn as well as free character customization and stunning action based battles.
FINAL FANTASY X/X-2 HD Remaster
-50% NT$ 688  NT$ 344
Hollow Knight
-50% NT$ 398  NT$ 199
FINAL FANTASY IX
-50% NT$ 568  NT$ 284
For The King
-70% NT$ 318  NT$ 95
Katamari Damacy REROLL
-67% NT$ 590  NT$ 194
SPECIAL PROMOTION! Offer ends 8 Jul 1:00am CST
The beloved roll-em-up game returns with fully updated graphics, completely recreated cutscenes and in full HD!
Dicey Dungeons
-75% NT$ 268  NT$ 67
Ori and the Will of the Wisps
-67% NT$ 438  NT$ 144
The Legend of Tianding
-40% NT$ 398  NT$ 238
SPECIAL PROMOTION! Offer ends 8 Jul 1:00am CST
The Legend of Tianding is a sidescrolling action game about Liao Tianding, the legendary Taiwanese Folk Hero. Explore the dazzling streets of Colonial Japanese Taiwan in the early 20th century.
Specific pricing and discounts may be subject to change. Please check the Steam store page for details.

-33% NT$ 398  NT$ 266
特別促銷！1 月 20 日 2:00am CST 截止
《廖添丁 - 稀代兇賊の最期》是一款2D動作橫軸平台遊戲。玩家扮演台灣傳奇英雄--廖添丁，穿梭在20世紀初的大台北地區，劫富濟貧、行俠仗義，並隨著劇情發展，經歷一段精彩的冒險故事。
